title: Tobey Maguire
summary: Tobias Vincent Maguire (born June 27, 1975[1]) is an American actor and film producer. He is best known for playing the title character from Sam Raimi's Spider-Man trilogy (2002â€“2007). His other films include Pleasantville (1998), Ride with the Devil (1999), The Cider House Rules (1999), Wonder Boys (2000), Seabiscuit (2003), The Good German (2006), Brothers (2009), and The Great Gatsby (2013).
